title: Bij ons aan Boord
overview: Airplanes of Transavia can fly at a maximum height of 12.500 meters, which is the equivalent of stacking up 38 eiffel towers. It is at those heights that consumers of Transavia are flying to one of their 109 destinations. Transavia will open it's doors and the viewer will look behind the scenes in this six part reality series.In Bij ons aan Boord we will follow multiple employees of Transavia in several departments. We get to know them as human and as service provider, will follow them and witness them doing their utmost to provide the best service possible for their passengers.
